subject: Three open development competitions: $7,200 in prizes.
body:
Hello sm1lies,

We thought you would like to know that we have three component development projects currently open for registration for a total prize pool of $7,200.

* Java Diagram UML Class Elements ($2,000)
* Custom Java Time Tracker Fixed Billing Entry ($2,000) 
* Java Chat Message Pool ($800)

The registration issues affecting Time Tracker Fixed Billing Entry have been fixed, and the registration timeline was extended as well.

Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.

www.topcoder.com

Glastonbury, CT 06033
